# super-tab



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Methods

### `getRootScrollableEl() => Promise<HTMLElement | null>`

Returns the root scrollable element

#### Returns

Type: `Promise<HTMLElement | null>`




## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                | Description                            |
| ------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--super-tab-width` | Width of the tab. Defaults to `100vw`. |
